ğŸ“ Buffalo Chicken Dip Recipe

Ingredients

âœ”ï¸ 2 cups cooked, shredded chicken (rotisserie chicken is what I used)
âœ”ï¸ 8 oz cream cheese, softened
âœ”ï¸ 1/2 cup Frankâ€™s RedHot sauce 
âœ”ï¸ 1/2 cup ranch 
âœ”ï¸ 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (plus extra for topping)
Sliced chives for garnish

Instructions

Preheat Oven: Preheat your oven to 375Â°F.

In a large bowl, combine the chicken, cream cheese, Frankâ€™s RedHot sauce, cheese and ranch dressing. Stir until smooth.

Spread the mixture into a cast iron skillet or 8x8-inch baking dish. Sprinkle additional cheddar cheese on top.

Bake: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the dip is hot and bubbly.

Garnish and Serve: Remove from the oven, garnish with chives (optional), and serve warm.

Serving Suggestions:

Serve with tortilla chips, celery sticks, carrots, or crackers for dipping!
